/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with cars and buses, cuts through the heart of the city, reflecting the rhythm of urban life. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a hazy blue, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, the silhouettes of skyscrapers punctuate the horizon, standing tall against the skyline.
